an5.214:1.3: Musā bhaṇati, pisuṇaṁ bhaṇati, pharusaṁ bhaṇati, samphappalāpaṁ bhaṇati, kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
an5.214:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā bahubhāṇismiṁ puggale.
an5.214:2.3: Na musā bhaṇati, na pisuṇaṁ bhaṇati, na pharusaṁ bhaṇati, na samphappalāpaṁ bhaṇati, kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati.
an5.214:2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṁsā mantabhāṇismiṁ puggale”ti.
